page.title: 05Farming - Garden Centre
page.content: Gillespie's Garden Centre covers 70 acres of ground.It consists of plants, trees and shrubs which are grown there.Gillespie sells peat,fertilisers pesticides and gardening equipment.The garden centre has 7 large greenhouses, full of plants.Gillespie employs 7 full-time workers who work all year round.Gillespie's customers come from all round Ulster,mostly gardeners but not farmers.Also Gillespie is employed to carry out landscape gardening and maintaining tubs around public buildings.In the wintertime they are slack in the trade but not in work.I thought the centre was successful and I think the man was right to say that they were going to extend it.The bit I liked best was the long path;on one side it was an ordinary hedge and on the other it was a lovely landscaped garden to show the use of plants.
